snippet: The sixth-ranked Wildcats made 50 percent of their second-half shots from the field to bounce back from their worst-shooting first half of the season and beat the Red Storm at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Villanova men's basketball team defeats St John's, 68-53; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The sixth-ranked Wildcats made 50 percent of their second-half shots from the field to bounce back from their worst-shooting first half of the season and beat the Red Storm at Madison Square Garden.

headline.print_headline: Villanova Overcomes Poor Half Vs. St. John’s
headline.main: Villanova Overcomes Poor Half vs. St. John’s
